title: Decorating the Christmas Tree
story: A: Can you help me, Barbara? B: Sure, dad. With what? A: It's time to decorate our Christmas tree. B: That sounds like fun! A: Here is the tinsel, and the lights. B: Can I string the lights, dad? A: Sure, Barbara. Go all the way around. B: I like decorating the tree.
summary: A heartwarming story about a father and daughter decorating their Christmas tree together.
image: An illustration of a father and daughter decorating a Christmas tree.
